mainBoard.flavorText: A ray of hope in the darkest night.

foreignData.flavorText: Ein Lichtblick in der dunkelsten Nacht.
foreignData.name: Lichtstute
foreignData.text: Wenn die Lichtstute ins Spiel kommt, tappe bis zu eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Du erhältst Lebenspunkte in Höhe der Stärke der Kreatur dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: Un rayo de esperanza en la noche más oscura.
foreignData.name: Yegua radiante
foreignData.text: Cuando la Yegua radiante entre al campo de batalla, gira hasta una criatura objetivo. Ganas una cantidad de vidas igual a la fuerza de esa criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: Un rayon d'espoir éclairant la nuit la plus noire.
foreignData.name: Jument de brillance
foreignData.text: Quand la Jument de brillance arrive sur le champ de bataille, engagez jusqu'à une créature ciblée. Vous gagnez un nombre de points de vie égal à la force de cette créature.

foreignData.flavorText: Un raggio di speranza nella più buia delle notti.
foreignData.name: Splendidestriero
foreignData.text: Quando lo Splendidestriero entra nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa fino a una creatura bersaglio. Guadagni punti vita pari alla forza di quella creatura.

foreignData.flavorText: 闇夜を切裂く、希望の光条。
foreignData.name: 煌々馬
foreignData.text: 煌々馬が戦場に出たとき、クリーチャー最大１体を対象とする。それをタップする。あなたはそのクリーチャーのパワーに等しい点数のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 至黯黑夜中的希望明光。
foreignData.name: 明驹
foreignData.text: 当明驹进战场时，横置至多一个目标生物。你获得等同于该生物力量的生命。

mainBoard.name: Brightmare
mainBoard.originalText: When Brightmare enters the battlefield, tap up to one target creature. You gain life equal to that creature's power.

rulings.text: Brightmare’s ability can target a tapped creature. If the target creature is already tapped when the ability resolves, that creature just remains tapped and you gain life equal to its power.
If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Brightmare’s ability tries to resolve, the ability won’t resolve. You won’t gain any life.

mainBoard.text: When Brightmare enters, tap up to one target creature. You gain life equal to that creature's power.

{4}{W}, {T}: Schicke eine andere Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil und bringe sie dann unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.name: Conjuradora distinguida

foreignData.name: 著名な妖術師
foreignData.text:
これでないクリーチャー１体があなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
{4}{W},{T}：あなたがコントロールしていてこれでないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを追放し、その後、オーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。

foreignData.name: 杰出咒法师
foreignData.text:
每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。
{4}{W}，{T}：放逐另一个目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

mainBoard.name: Distinguished Conjurer
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
{4}{W}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

rulings.text: Distinguished Conjurer's first ability triggers whenever any creature other than itself enters the battlefield under your control, including those returned by its last ability.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won't return to the battlefield.

When the card exiled by the second ability returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the card that was exiled. Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners' graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life.

mainBoard.name: Thraben Inspector
mainBoard.originalText: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

rulings.text: If you sacrifice a Clue for another card's cost or effect, such as that of Angelic Purge or Tamiyo's Journal, you can't also pay {2} and sacrifice it to draw a card.
The token is named Clue Token and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn't a creature type.
The tokens are normal artifacts. For example, they can be sacrificed to cast Angelic Purge or targeted by Root Out.

mainBoard.text: When Thraben Inspector enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

mainBoard.name: Wispweaver Angel
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Wispweaver Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

rulings.text: Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners' graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creature will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist.
If a creature token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won't return to the battlefield.

Wispweaver Angel's triggered ability can target another Wispweaver Angel. If so, the two Angels can loop in and out of exile as many times as you'd like before you choose to target another creature or not to use the triggered ability.

mainBoard.text:
Flying

mainBoard.name: Acrobatic Maneuver
mainBoard.originalText:
Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: After the creature returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the creature that was exiled. It won't be in combat or have any additional abilities it may have had before it was exiled. Any +1/+1 counters on it or Auras attached to it are removed, and any Equipment will no longer be attached.

foreignData.flavorText: "Oh sì, ho sette vite... ma questo non significa che sono disposta a sprecarne una adesso."
foreignData.name: Fremito del Fato
foreignData.text: Esilia una creatura o un incantesimo bersaglio, poi rimetti quel permanente sul campo di battaglia sotto il controllo del suo proprietario.

foreignData.flavorText: 「確かに命は九つあるけど、ここでひとつ無駄にしようとは思ってないよ。」
foreignData.name: 運命のちらつき
foreignData.text: クリーチャーやエンチャントのうち１つを対象とする。それを追放し、その後、オーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: 「没错，我是有九条命，但我现在不是很想浪费一条。」
foreignData.name: 明灭命运
foreignData.text: 放逐目标生物或结界，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

mainBoard.name: Flicker of Fate
mainBoard.originalText: Exile target creature or enchantment, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

rulings.text: If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.

If an Aura is put onto the battlefield without being cast, the Aura’s controller-to-be chooses what it will enchant as it comes back onto the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn’t target anything (so it could be attached to an opponent’s permanent with hexproof, for example), but the Aura’s enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can’t legally be attached to anything, it remains in its current zone.

Once the exiled permanent returns, it’s considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled permanent will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist.

mainBoard.text: Exile target creature or enchantment, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainBoard.flavorText: Two taken, two judged, one returned.

foreignData.flavorText: Zwei verschwanden, einer kehrte zurück.
foreignData.name: Im Jenseits abrechnen
foreignData.text:
Bestimme eines oder beides —
• Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du nicht kontrollierst, ins Exil.
• Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil und bringe sie dann unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Se llevaron a dos, juzgaron a dos, pero solo una regresó.
foreignData.name: Solucionar más allá de la realidad
foreignData.text:
Elige uno o ambos:
• Exilia la criatura objetivo que no controlas.
• Exilia la criatura objetivo que controlas, luego regrésala al campo de batalla bajo el control de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: Deux furent choisis, deux furent jugés, un seul revint.
foreignData.name: Résolution hors réalité
foreignData.text:
Choisissez l'un ou les deux —
• Exilez une créature ciblée que vous ne contrôlez pas.
• Exilez une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez, puis renvoyez-la sur le champ de bataille sous le contrôle de son propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: Due furono presi, due furono giudicati, uno fece ritorno.
foreignData.name: Resa dei Conti Surreale
foreignData.text:
Scegli uno o entrambi —
• Esilia una creatura bersaglio che non controlli.
• Esilia una creatura bersaglio che controlli, poi rimettila sul campo di battaglia sotto il controllo del suo proprietario.

foreignData.flavorText: 二人が消え、二人が裁かれ、一人が戻った。
foreignData.name: 超現実的決着
foreignData.text:
以下から１つまたは両方を選ぶ。
• あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを追放する。
• あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを追放し、その後、オーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: 羁押两人，审判两人，返回一人。
foreignData.name: 超凡安生
foreignData.text:
选择一项或都选～
•放逐目标不由你操控的生物。
•放逐目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

mainBoard.name: Settle Beyond Reality
mainBoard.originalText:
Choose one or both —
• Exile target creature you don't control.
• Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

rulings.text: If a token you control is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.

Once the exiled creature you control returns, it’s considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled creatures will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creatures will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creatures will cease to exist.

mainBoard.text:
Choose one or both —
• Exile target creature you don't control.
• Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

foreignData.name: Fesseln des Glaubens
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine bleibende Karte
Wenn die Fesseln des Glaubens ins Spiel kommen, erhältst du 4 Lebenspunkte dazu.
Die verzauberte bleibende Karte kann nicht angreifen oder blocken, und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden, es sei denn, es sind Manafähigkeiten.

foreignData.name: Grilletes de fe
foreignData.text:
Encantar permanente.
Cuando los Grilletes de fe entren al campo de batalla, ganas 4 vidas.
El permanente encantado no puede atacar ni bloquear y no pueden activarse sus habilidades activadas, a menos que sean habilidades de maná.

foreignData.name: Fers de la foi
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : permanent
Quand les Fers de la foi arrivent sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez 4 points de vie.
Le permanent enchanté ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées à moins qu'elles ne soient des capacités de mana.

foreignData.name: Pastoie della Fede
foreignData.text:
Incanta permanente
Quando le Pastoie della Fede entrano nel campo di battaglia, guadagni 4 punti vita.
Il permanente incantato non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate a meno che non siano abilità di mana.

foreignData.name: 信仰の足枷
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（パーマネント）
信仰の足枷が戦場に出たとき、あなたは４点のライフを得る。
エンチャントしているパーマネントでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力はマナ能力でないかぎり起動できない。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: 信念拘锁
foreignData.text:
结附于永久物
当信念拘锁进战场时，你获得4点生命。
所结附的永久物不能进行攻击或阻挡，且除了法术力异能之外，其起动式异能也不能起动。

mainBoard.name: Faith's Fetters
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

rulings.text: Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written "[Cost]: [Effect]." Some keywords (such as equip) are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text. Loyalty abilities of planeswalkers are activated abilities.
Faith's Fetters doesn't stop static abilities, triggered abilities, or mana abilities from working. A mana ability is an ability that produces mana, not an ability that costs mana.
If the target permanent is an illegal target by the time Faith's Fetters tries to resolve, it doesn't resolve. It won't enter the battlefield, so its enters-the-battlefield ability won't trigger.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

mainBoard.flavorText: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Blüte der Wildblumen richtet sich hier nicht nach den Jahreszeiten, sondern nach den Gezeiten der Magie.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Heide
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Heide kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Heide ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Weiß.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Las flores salvajes de aquí no florecen según las estaciones, sino según los altibajos y el flujo de la magia.
foreignData.name: Brezal floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Brezal floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Brezal floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea blanco.
{T}: Agrega {W} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Ici, les fleurs sauvages s'épanouissent non pas au gré des saisons mais au gré des flux de magie.
foreignData.name: Prairie prospère
foreignData.text:
La Prairie prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
Au moment où la Prairie prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le blanc.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: I fiori selvatici qui non sbocciano in base alle stagioni, ma seguendo il fluire della magia.

Mentre la Brughiera Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal bianco.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 季節ではなく魔法の干満に従って野生の花が咲く。

{T}：{W}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 驱使这片野花绽放的，并非季节更替，而是魔力起伏。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Heath
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Heath enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Heath enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.

Thriving Heath enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
